channel.title: Testscape compiling error!
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]i have a huge problem... i try to edit my testscape server then compile and all i get is...javac not reconized then somthin like internal or external commands... plz help i would greatly apprectiate it. [/glow]
[glow=blue,2,300]cya laters![/glow]

you know where i can update my java?

item.title: Testscape compiling error!
item.dc:creator: @sKuLL819 sKuLL819
item.description:
@sKuLL819 wrote:

hmm.

try this:

right-click compile and click edit. erase whats there and paste:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server
pause

change jre1.5.0_07 to your version of java. if you have version 09 it would be jre1.5.0_09

Read full topic
